text: Lahore Qalandars (; ; abbreviated as LQ) is one of the six teams which plays in the Pakistan Super League (PSL). The team represents the city of Lahore and was founded in 2015. It is owned by Fawad Rana (Qatar Lubricants Company Limited (QALCO)). Brendon McCullum is the captain of Lahore Qalandars, while the head coach is Aqib Javed. == Squad == The Lahore Qalandars 2018. Types Players Captain Brendon McCullum Coach Aqib Javed Team Members Umar Akmal, Sunil Narine, Brendon McCullum, Fakhar Zaman, Yasir Shah, Cameron Delport, Aamer Yamin, Bilawal Bhatti, Sohail Khan, Chris Lynn, Mustafizur Rehman, Bilal Asif, Raza Hasan, Sohail Akhtar, Shaheen Shah Afridi, Ghulam Mudassar, Anton Devcich, Mitchell McClenaghan, Gulraiz Sadaf, Imran Khan Jr. and Salman Irshad ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Lahore Category:Pakistan Super League teams Category:2015 establishments in Pakistan
title: Lahore Qalandars
